levels.description: Instantly generates <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP; Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to at most <@ba.vup>6</> ground enemies within a cross area, then eliminates any of the enemies that are <$ba.dying>Critically Wounded</>. <@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charge(s)</>
